channel.title: Dividends on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Dividends on FinanClub

item.title: ITUB
item.description: score:76 Chances: Itaú Unibanco Holding S.A. (NYSE: ITUB) has announced a dividend of $0.23 per share, payable on 2024-03-15 Increased operating revenues and managerial financial margin are partially offset by escalating costs for Itau Unibanco (ITUB) in fourth-quarter 2023 ITUB is one of the largest privately held banks in Brazil with significant operations in several South American countries Risks: Itaú Unibanco Holding S.

item.title: ET
item.description: score:-33 Chances: ET engages in natural gas pipeline transportation and transmission services Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases aid Q4 earnings The average brokerage recommendation for ET is equivalent to a Buy Investors may keep a tab on stocks like ET that have higher dividend yields compared to the industry Risks: Effectiveness of overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts is questionable Lower commodity price realizations affecting Q4 earnings Potential challenges in finding the right dividend stocks to invest in The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable Score:-33 chances characters count - risks characters count = -33

item.title: PPL
item.description: score:6 Chances: PPL’s fourth-quarter earnings are better than estimates and the company continues to make substantial investment to further strengthen its existing operations. Robust Capital Investment Plan and Dividend Growth Announced PPL’s estimated fair value is US$20.44 based on Dividend Discount Model Risks: PPL Corporation misses on earnings expectations.
